invocations.description: Returns a pointer to the container datastructure for the specificed container with index containerindex ranging from 0-15. If all paramater is given it returns all the containers found with the first parameter. If you need more info about the container data structure, access this.
invocations.exDescription: Will print the name of the first container.

invocations.description: Returns a pointer to the container datastructure for the specificed container with name containername. If all paramater is given it returns all the containers found with the first parameter. If you need more info about the container data structure, access this.

Returns a pointer to the container datastructure for the specificed container with id containerid. If all paramater is given it returns all the containers found with the first parameter. If you need more info about the container data structure, access this.
